subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Springstead was an American League umpire from 1966 to 1985 and worked in four League Championship Series, three World Series and three All-Star Games.
snippet: Mr. Springstead was an American League umpire from 1966 to 1985 and worked in four League Championship Series, three World Series and three All-Star Games.
